page.title: 12FARMING(CONT.)-OUTWOOD AREA
page.content: WE CHOSE LOFTHOUSE FARM TO STUDY ALSO BECAUSE IT WAS CONCERNED WITH THE PRODUCTION OF BEEF.THE FARM COVERS AN AREA OF 200 ACRES,THE MAJORITY OF WHICH IS OPEN GRAZING LAND.THERE IS A LARGE SHED IN WHICH YOUNG CALVES ARE FED SOLELY BARLEY,FOR A PERIOD OF 6 MONTHS-THESE ARE THE BARLEY BEEF CATTLE. THE CATTLE BRED ON THE FARM ARE SUSSEX FRIESIAN,CHAROLAIS AND ABERDEEN ANGUS, AND ANY OF THESE ARE CROSS BRED.THE CATTLE ARE BOUGHT AND SOLD AT MARKETS WITHIN THE COUNTY,LEYBURN,YORK AND HOLMFIRTH.THE FARMER EMPLOYS ONLY TWO WORKERS THROUGHOUT THE YEAR,ANY OTHER HELP IS TAKEN FROM THE EMPLOYEES AT THEIR OTHER ARABLE FARM.
